Name: Minesweeper Ultimate
About the game: Minesweeper is back, and this time it's personal. Relive the suspense and excitement of old-school minesweeper in classic mode. Enjoy all three standard minesweeper boards, with an atmospheric soundtrack and choice of visual styles. Avoid sticky situations using hints to eliminate guesswork. New challenges await you with hex and triangular game modes. Take your minesweeper skills to a whole new level! Earn achievements by completing minesweeper boards quickly. Compete against the best minesweepers by setting high scores on worldwide leaderboards. What are you waiting for? Let's play minesweeper!
